aeon-line.aeon-raw: The stars shine down from the sky above, bathing the arid land beneath their silvery light. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. A crystalline golem stands here. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "SERAGORN". Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "AUSTERE". A mighty ghost basilisk lingers, its great, ethereal shape shifting subtly. Impastus, the last of the diffamo is here, attentively awaiting his master, while searching for food. A gilded pike with the decapitated heads of Mercurus, Talamond, Issam, Atalkez, Lii and Mako has been erected here. Coiled upon itself, a brightly banded marsh krait lurks here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. Turgid and blistered, a severed leg lies motionless here. There are 23 chipped tangerine shards here. There are 13 jagged crimson shards here. There are 2 smooth sable shards here.

aeon-printed.span: The stars shine down from the sky above, bathing the arid land beneath their silvery light. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. A crystalline golem stands here. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "SERAGORN". Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "AUSTERE". A mighty ghost basilisk lingers, its great, ethereal shape shifting subtly. Impastus, the last of the diffamo is here, attentively awaiting his master, while searching for food. A gilded pike with the decapitated heads of Mercurus, Talamond, Issam, Atalkez, Lii and Mako has been erected here. Coiled upon itself, a brightly banded marsh krait lurks here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. Turgid and blistered, a severed leg lies motionless here. There are 23 chipped tangerine shards here. There are 13 jagged crimson shards here. There are 2 smooth sable shards here.
